title: The DAO for all games on ICP
The hub of 100% on-chain games
Proof of $BOOM Viral Marketing Campaign
Only possible on the Internet Computer

mission.title: Our mission
mission.sub_title: BOOM gaming DAO’s three-fold mission is to build the gaming vertical of the Internet Computer blockchain, power the next generation of fully on-chain games, and provide a collaborative hub for all things web3 gaming.

cards.title: Showcase the Unique Capabilities of Internet Computer for Gaming
cards.text: We are committed to demonstrating the unique capabilities of the Internet Computer blockchain by pushing its gaming vertical, bringing the technology into the mainstream by exploding its vibrant gaming ecosystem.

cards.title: Build the Foundational Infrastructure for On-Chain Gaming
cards.text: We are dedicated to developing the infrastructure that will power the next generation of fully on-chain games on ICP, creating new possibilities for gamers and developers alike.

cards.title: Foster Collaboration in the ICP Gaming Community
cards.text: We are creating an all-in-one collaborative hub where anyone involved in ICP gaming can contribute and reap the benefits, whether they're a gamer, builder, developer, guild, investor, partner, or other stakeholder.

tools.title: Open-source tools
tools.sub_title: We embrace the spirit of collaboration and collective growth to foster network effects for game developers across the Internet Computer ecosystem. Everything we build will always be open-source: Game Launcher, World Engine, World Template, Unity Template, Tools, Standards, Examples, and more to come.

launcher.title: Game launcher
launcher.text: Shorten game development timelines from months to days. Deploy WebGL, PC, and Android game canisters, create NFT and Token collections, perform seamless airdrops, manage in-game NFT and Token minting, process payments and staking, configure your World smart contract and more.

world_engine.title: World protocol
world_engine.sub_title:
The on-chain protocol for all gaming worlds established on the Internet Computer.

This Powerhouse of Worlds weaves together a complex interconnected ecosystem of ICP games into one universally accessible database, supercharged with modular game logic, composable data standards, and customizable access control for interactions across game worlds.

All worlds built with the World Protocol are interoperable from Day 1.

guilds.title: Game guilds
guilds.text:
Are you ready to join a thriving community of passionate gamers? Look no further than our guilds section!

With a constantly increasing number of members, you'll be part of a vibrant community that's always growing and having fun.

And the best part? Joining is just a click away! Simply hit the registration button and become a part of something truly special.

text.static_text:
As the DAO for all ICP games, BOOM is perfectly suited to be a Service Nervous System (SNS), an advanced form of DAO powered by the Internet Computer.

Each contribution to BOOM is community owned and governed through a digital democratic process: 100% on-chain, open-source, and transparent.

The evolution of BOOM can only be decided and approved via its SNS. By engaging with this system, the whole BOOM community shapes the future of gaming on ICP.
texts: FOR THE GAMERS, BY THE GAMERS

whitepaper.sub_title: The BOOM DAO Whitepaper is your guide to the future of on-chain gaming. It covers the project's mission, technical architecture, governance model, funding initiatives, growth strategy, and sustainability plans. The document also outlines the project's tokenomics, roadmap, and democratic governance.
